title: 07/20/21 DPS Hour 3 Dick Ebersol
itunes:title: 07/20/21 DPS Hour 3 Dick Ebersol
description:
Dick Ebersol talks to Dan about the time Muhammad Ali lit the Olympic torch. Dick said that, at that time, Ali was more popular than the Pope.
